sentences.en: A consultation paper has been posted on the Internet inviting input from Net users.
sentences.cn: 一份征询意见书已贴在了因特网上，欢迎网络用户发表意见。

sentences.en: A servomechanism which follows changes in the input signal.
sentences.cn: 一种跟踪输入信号变化的伺服机制.

sentences.en: All this information had to be input onto the computer.
sentences.cn: 所有这些信息都必须输入计算机。

sentences.en: As the input of energy is increased, the volume gets louder.
sentences.cn: 随着能量输入的增加, 音量变得更大.

sentences.en: At which point I piped up and asked whether it might be at all possible to have some positive input.
sentences.cn: 在此我插了一句询问这事儿是否会产生一些积极的投入。

sentences.en: data input
sentences.cn: 数据输入

sentences.en: Edit the input text and re-run the software.
sentences.cn: 修改输入的文本，重新运行软件。

sentences.en: He suggested that many of the ideas just would not work. But the tenor of his input was "Right on! Please show us how to make them work".
sentences.cn: 他认为这些想法有很多根本就不会奏效。但是他说话的大意却是“好极了！请告诉我们怎么让它们见效”。

sentences.en: Her specialist input to the discussions has been very useful.
sentences.cn: 她在这些讨论中提供的专家建议很有助益。

sentences.en: I will forever be grateful for his considerable input.
sentences.cn: 我将永远感激他的大量投入。

sentences.en: If the input data specified it, the file will close and the process terminates.
sentences.cn: 如果输入数据指定，该文件就会关闭，数据处理终止。

sentences.en: If the input voltage is plus three , it comes out as minus six.
sentences.cn: 如果输入的电压是+3伏, 那么输出的电压便是-6伏.

sentences.en: The computer acts as a word processor where the text of a speech can be input at any time.
sentences.cn: 计算机起着文字处理器的作用，一篇讲话的文本可随时输入。

sentences.en: The officers use stylus pen-based input devices to write their reports onto touch-sensitive screens.
sentences.cn: 警察使用手写笔输入设备在触控式屏幕上写报告。

sentences.en: The output should be proportional to the input.
sentences.cn: 输出应当与输入成比例.

sentences.en: The residues may be correlated with the radiational input.
sentences.cn: 余差可以与辐射输入数相关.

sentences.en: There has been a big input of resources into the project from industry.
sentences.cn: 工业界对这个项目投入了大量资源。

sentences.en: to input text/data/figures
sentences.cn: 把文本 / 数据 / 数字输入计算机

sentences.en: We listen to our employees and value their input.
sentences.cn: 我们听取员工的想法，重视他们的意见和建议。

sentences.en: We're getting input from gobs of sources.
sentences.cn: 我们从多方渠道得到信息。

phrases.tran_cn: 数据输入，资料输入；输入数据

trans.tran_cn: 输入，投入，输入电路，<电>输入端，输入的数据
trans.tran_en: ideas, advice, money, or effort that you put into a job or activity in order to help it succeed

trans.tran_cn: [自][电子] 输入；将…输入电脑
trans.tran_en: If you input information into a computer, you feed it in, for example, by typing it on a keyboard

trans.tran_cn: 把…输入电脑，[自][电子] 输入，输入，给料
trans.tran_en: to put information into a computer
